                   }\n                        }, 100);\n                    }\n                })();\n            </script>\n        </head>\n<body class=\"lang-en  is-portal \">\n<script    <div class=\"slide-sbginfo-tabs__content small center-block\">\n                    <p>The Salzburg Card provides you with free or discounted admission to numerous sightseeing attractions, along with free use of public transportation.</p>\n                </div>\n                <div class=\"slide-sbginfo-tabs__buttonrow  mt-20\">\n                    <a
